channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 泰国、马来西亚、新加坡希望通过免签旅游吸引中国人
item.description: Chinese engineer and aviation enthusiast Wei Ming is exactly the kind of visitor the tourism authorities in Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand are looking for.翻译:中国工程师兼航空爱好者魏明正是新加坡、马来西亚和泰国旅游部门正在寻找的游客。
item.author: Xinghui Kok, Lisa Barrington, Orathai Sriring

item.title: 英国基金经理阿什莫尔退出对中国恒大的押注 - 彭博新闻
item.description: UK's Ashmore Group , formerly a major holder of China Evergrande Group's offshore debt, fully exited its investment in the Chinese property developer late last year, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，英国安石集团（Ashmore Group）曾是中国恒大集团海外债务的主要持有者，去年年底完全退出了对这家中国房地产开发商的投资。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管寻求更大的中国贸易，危地马拉仍与台湾保持关系
item.description: Guatemala has no intention of breaking diplomatic relations with Taiwan despite seeking closer economic links with China, President Bernardo Arevalo said on Thursday, pledging to boost ties with both players in parallel.翻译:危地马拉总统贝尔纳多·阿雷瓦洛周四表示，尽管寻求与中国建立更紧密的经济联系，但无意与台湾断绝外交关系，并承诺同时加强与两国的关系。
item.author: Sofia Menchu

item.title: 法国当局因财务不当行为搜查华为办公室
item.description: Chinese tech giant Huawei said on Thursday a search took place at its French office two days ago, confirming earlier reports from local media about a raid by France's PNF prosecution office linked to potential embezzlement charges.翻译:中国科技巨头华为周四表示，两天前对其法国办事处进行了搜查，证实了当地媒体早些时候关于法国 PNF 检察机关突击搜查与潜在贪污指控有关的报道。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国立法者指责风险投资公司为中国军事相关公司提供资金
item.description: Sequoia Capital China, Qualcomm Ventures and three other U.S. venture capital firms plowed at least $3 billion into Chinese tech companies that support Beijing's military and its repression of minorities in Xinjiang, a U.S. congressional report alleged on Thursday.翻译:美国国会周四发布的一份报告称，红杉资本中国基金、高通风险投资公司和其他三家美国风险投资公司向支持北京军队及其镇压新疆少数民族的中国科技公司投入了至少 30 亿美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国议员敦促商务部将 TikTok 母公司字节跳动列入出口管制名单
item.description: A group of 15 U.S. lawmakers on Thursday urged the Commerce Department to add TikTok's China-based parent company ByteDance to a government export control list to restrict its access to American software.翻译:由 15 名美国议员组成的团体周四敦促商务部将 TikTok 的中国母公司字节跳动列入政府出口管制名单，以限制其获取美国软件。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 卡塔尔首轮比赛后吴和隆巴德并列领先
item.description: China's Ashun Wu and South African Zander Lombard carded five-under-par 67s to share the one-shot lead after the first round of the Qatar Masters on Thursday at the Doha Golf Club.翻译:周四在多哈高尔夫俱乐部举行的卡塔尔大师赛第一轮比赛结束后，中国选手吴阿顺和南非选手赞德·隆巴德打出低于标准杆 5 杆的 67 杆，并以一杆领先。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 普京和习近平拒绝美国的“干涉”，赞扬两国关系和贸易 - 克里姆林宫
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said.翻译:克里姆林宫表示，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京和中国国家主席习近平周四通电话，均拒绝美国干涉其他国家事务。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 拉尔夫·劳伦 (Ralph Lauren) 乘着强劲的假日需求和中国市场反弹，公布了乐观的业绩
item.description: Ralph Lauren beat profit expectations for the 14th straight quarter on Thursday, driven by robust holiday demand for its pricey cashmere sweaters, coats and cocktail dresses in the U.S. and a rebound in China.翻译:周四，拉尔夫·劳伦 (Ralph Lauren) 的利润连续第 14 个季度超出预期，这得益于美国对其昂贵的羊绒毛衣、外套和鸡尾酒会礼服的强劲节日需求以及中国市场的反弹。
item.author: Deborah Sophia

item.title: Tapestry因中国需求反弹和强劲利润率上调2024年利润预测
item.description: Coach parent Tapestry raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, betting on full-price sales of its premium handbags and early signs of a demand recovery in key market China.翻译:Coach 母公司 Tapestry 周四上调了年度利润预期，押注其优质手袋的全价销售以及主要市场中国需求复苏的早期迹象。
item.author: Savyata Mishra

item.title: 中国习近平与普京通话时敦促“密切战略协作”
item.description: China's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the two countries should pursue close strategic coordination and defend the sovereignty, security and development interests of their respective countries, state media said.翻译:据官方媒体报道，中国国家主席习近平向俄罗斯总统普京表示，两国应密切战略协作，捍卫各自国家的主权、安全和发展利益。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: “消防员”吴在溃败后成为中国市场监管者
item.description: The new head of China's market regulator is tough on insider trading, fights fires fast, works closely with Communist Party leaders and has managed a stock exchange - a perfect profile for someone taking charge of the country's cratering stock markets.翻译:中国市场监管机构的新任负责人对内幕交易采取强硬态度，快速救火，与共产党领导人密切合作，并管理过一家证券交易所——这对于掌管中国陷入困境的股市的人来说是完美的形象。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Joe Cash, Samuel Shen

item.title: 一年过去了，一位中国明星交易撮合者的缺席给他的银行蒙上了一层阴影
item.description: Bao Fan was taken away by Chinese authorities and hasn't been seen by colleagues since.翻译:包凡被中国当局带走，此后同事就再也没有见过他。
item.author: Selena Li, Julie Zhu

item.title: 1月份中国乘用车销量环比下降14.1%
item.description: China's passenger vehicle sales shrank 14.1% in January from the prior month, the first such slide since August, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Thursday.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周四公布的数据显示，1月份中国乘用车销量环比下降14.1%，这是自8月份以来首次出现下滑。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国银行2月份将维持中期政策利率不变
item.description: China's central bank is expected to stand pat on a key policy rate when rolling over the maturing medium-term loans in just over a week from now, a Reuters survey showed, as the authorities appear to be keen to maintain currency stability.翻译:路透调查显示，预计中国央行将在一周多后的时间内展期到期中期贷款时维持关键政策利率，因为当局似乎热衷于维持货币稳定。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受北京救援行动影响，中国股市创一年多以来最佳单周表现
item.description: Beaten-up Chinese stocks capped off their best week in more than a year on Thursday after a change of leadership at the market regulator and a string of support measures from Beijing ahead of an extended break stemmed a heavy selloff.翻译:周四，市场监管机构领导层发生变动，北京方面在延长休市前采取了一系列支持措施，遏制了严重抛售，遭受重创的中国股市周四迎来了一年多来表现最好的一周。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 通货紧缩风险困扰中国消费价格创2009年以来最大跌幅
item.description: China's consumer prices fell at their steepest pace in more than 14 years in January while producer prices also dropped, ramping up pressure on policymakers to do more to revive an economy low on confidence and facing deflationary risks.翻译:1月份，中国消费者价格指数出现14年来最大跌幅，生产者价格指数也出现下降，加大了政策制定者的压力，要求他们采取更多措施来重振信心低迷并面临通货紧缩风险的经济。
item.author: Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国居民消费价格同比下降0.8%，工厂通缩持续存在
item.description: China's consumer prices extended their decline for a fourth month in January while producer prices also dropped, underscoring deflationary risks facing the world's second-biggest economy as it struggles to mount a solid recovery.翻译:1月份，中国消费者价格指数连续第四个月下跌，生产者价格指数也下跌，凸显了这个世界第二大经济体在努力实现稳健复苏的过程中面临的通货紧缩风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称梅西缺席香港比赛超出“体育领域”
item.description: Chinese state media, Hong Kong politicians and some fans swiftly condemned Argentine player Lionel Messi's participation in a match in Japan on Wednesday after staying on the bench just days earlier in a highly anticipated game in Hong Kong.翻译:中国官方媒体、香港政界人士和一些球迷迅速谴责阿根廷球员莱昂内尔·梅西(Lionel Messi)周三参加日本的一场比赛，几天前他在香港一场备受期待的比赛中坐在替补席上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 对于中国的新环球旅行者来说，跟团游已经过时，北极光已经到来
item.description: Yuwei Zhangzou represents a new type of Chinese tourist.翻译:于伟掌走代表了一种新型的中国游客。
item.author: Casey Hall, Sophie Yu
